question: In which city, the Himalayan Mountaineering Institute (HMI) is situated ?
explanation: The Himalayan Mountaineering Institute (HMI) was established in the year 1954 by then Prime Minister of India, Pt. Jawahar Lal Nehru at Darjeeling, West Bengal. The main motive behind establishment of this institute was to encourage mountaineering as an organized sports.
